message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something really valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice!  I really appreciate it, but I'm looking to spend closer to $100 for this product.  Would you be willing to go down to $105?
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand you're looking to get the best deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $110. It's a fair price considering the product's value. What do you think?
